alert.note: Alert for Knox; Peoria; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:52PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT STARK...NORTHEASTERN KNOX AND NORTHWESTERN PEORIA COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Galva, or 9 miles southeast of Cambridge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wyoming, Toulon, Osceola, Bradford, Williamsfield, Altona, Elmira, Victoria, West Jersey, La Fayette, Castleton, Elmore, and Snake Den Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
